sentences: Teodross Avery (born July 2, 1973 in Fairfield, California, United States) is an American jazz tenor saxophonist, who has released albums for the record labels including GRP Records and Impulse!
A native of the San Francisco Bay Area, his 2019 album was the live affair, After the Rain: A Night for Coltrane, released on Tompkins Square in May that year.
Harlem Stories: The Music of Thelonious Monk followed in September 2020.
New Day New Groove (5th Power Records, 2001)
Bridging the Gap: Hip Hop Jazz (BTG Music, 2011)
After The Rain: A Night For Coltrane (Tompkins Square, 2019)
Harlem Stories: The Music of Thelonious Monk (WJ3 Records, 2020)
